extendedInfo.description: If you liked the early Sim City tycoon games, you will definately love this city building game!In City Island you will build houses for your citizens, decorations and community buildings to make them happy, and create jobs so you can earn money and gold from your happy citizens. If you like to play free games on Androidâ¢, building a virtual life on City Island is your best choice! Discover a life in a virtual world full of quests where you have the power to build a business empire with a choice of 85+ unique buildings, like hotels, cinema's, offices, bakeries, restaurants, and even oil platforms on your paradise island. Grow you tiny city into a large metropolis. Catch some fish with your boats, make people happy by building parks, schools, churches, libraries, museums, plants, and even a nice ferris wheel. It is all about insight and balance in this city tycoon game: happy people attract more citizens, who will need residences and jobs. You have all the power in this epic story: discover what is the best way to be a successful entrepreneur on this fabulous island!** Features **- Fun FREE to play tycoon game- HIGH QUALITY graphics- Intuitive gameplay- Challenge to create your own new virtual paradise- Unlock and build from a list of 85+ Unique buildings (residential, commercial, community, decoration, plants, sea buildings like oil platforms and more)- Currencies: gold and cash- Attract citizens with parks, trees, and community buildings- Build residences for your citizens- Collect profit from your commercial buildings- Upgrade your city buildings- City park theme- Collect XP and level up to unlock new buildings for construction- Collect dozens of REWARDS while playing- Expand the tiny city on your paradise island to create more room for constructing more buildings, and making your tiny city bigger and bigger- Speed up construction/upgrade time using gold- Lots of adventure and quests to unlock- Help your citizens- Age independent story- Find pirate chests around your island, containing cash or gold- Tons of hours of fun- Sim style architecture- Play with your friends: enter friend codes and gift codes to receive cash and gold- The "City Advisor" will provide insight and tell you what is needed in your cityJoin the community and follow us on Twitter, and Like us on Facebook, to get FREE giftcodes every week!!

reviews.title: Very Good
reviews.comment: Quite entertaining and addictive game :) more interesting tasks would be nice addition... as well as more variety buildings available to pay with cash not only gold or choose option to pay with cash or gold
reviews.author: Monika Grabowska

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Really love this game. I never getting bored for play it..
reviews.author: Fauzia Anum

reviews.title: great but ..
reviews.comment: this game is realy awesome but ...i have a bug ..sometimes the game just shuts down automaticlly..pls fix so i can injoy more ...but u realy should try this game guys
reviews.author: Mohamed Raafat

reviews.title: sim city substitute
reviews.comment: very addictive more like a puzzle though than strategy cause of the extension problem - takes very long to expand. average graphics - needs animation & more involves cities like Sim city. once u figure it out it\'s not hard to get to level 30, but u need lots of patience. needs more codes but u do not need internet to play which is great -
reviews.author: Bob Marley

reviews.title: Great, addictive game
reviews.comment: I love this game,  but the update has frozen it. Is there a way to force it to close?  I\'m hopelessly addicted and really enjoy planning and rearranging the city. Does this new update provide more shops and houses? I was thinking that city bus stops, an antiques store, a public beach sign & life guard station and a bait & tackle shop might be great additions. And please, more houses.  Is there anyway to buy gold with the cash you\'re accumilating from the businesses? Im just about at the point where the only way I can continue is to slowly wait for the gold pieces to collect.  Love this game and hope you\'re able to do something about the game freeze.  I wish I hadn\'t checked yes when it asked me if I wanted to update.
reviews.author: JC Gatlin

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: I enjoyed playing this game everyday! *thumbs up!*
reviews.author: Cyndi Rella

reviews.title: I love this
reviews.comment: I absolutely love this game im so addicted it fun and exciting.
reviews.author: Rosa Willich

reviews.title: love this game
reviews.comment: well now this sucm due to u are forced to update and game crashes and freezes up my phone why fix some thing thT dont need fixing
reviews.author: Cass Kubsh

reviews.title: Good time filler but too difficult to obtain GOLD!!!!!
reviews.comment: Game has two objectionable issues. The first is the difficulty in obtaining the necessary gold to buy buildings. The second is the attachment to Facebook.  Please allow for the private moments of one\'s life. Not everyone wants to live in a glass house.
reviews.author: Dee Harris

reviews.title: Its ok
reviews.comment: Its no sim city.  Too many in game attempts to grab money.  20 bucks for game money? Are you serious?  Will be uninstalling, tired of attempts to grab money, just let me pay for game up front and leave me alone.

reviews.title: Latest update ruined the game!
reviews.comment: I loved the game until the last update. All the boats and cars disappeared, and any new buildings I construct are not visible. Using a samsung galaxy s4. Please fix!

reviews.comment: What a start! Can\'t read anything in the description!! Not a good sign.

reviews.title: Gettin Worse
reviews.comment: Every update is bringing new problems! What are you \"fixing\"!? Just done the latest update, now keeps telling me there\'s an update when there isn\'t & cash to collect completely vanishes from buildings to name a few. I keep downloading \"updates\" but they never tell me what the update was for!
